comment: The matrix consisting of the coefficients in the polynomial entries of a polynomial matrix having scaled monomials with the same power as entries is the matrix of the coefficients of the monomials or a zero matrix. Generalization of ~ decpmatid (but requires ` R ` to be commutative!). (Contributed by AV, 11-Nov-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Dec-2019.)
